overview:
Founder of Colnect Collectors Club Community.

Currently travels around the world while developing Colnect and publishes a column with his experiences called “Entrepreneur Around the World” on NewsGeek - http://www.newsgeek.co.il/author/amir-wald/

image.attribution: Scott Beale / Colnect Founder and Frog
